entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump In oct 2019 our unemployment rate was about 10%. The coronavirus brought us up to 14%. The average is around 4.6% and Obama left with 4.7%. Trump has hurt us
